1: Praise the Lord! Praise God in his Temple! Praise his strength in heaven!
2: Praise him for the mighty things he has done. Praise his supreme greatness.
3: Praise him with trumpets. Praise him with harps and lyres.
4: Praise him with drums and dancing. Praise him with harps and flutes.
5: Praise him with cymbals. Praise him with loud cymbals.
6: Praise the Lord, all living creatures! Praise the Lord!
